content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":174911,"originalJapaneseLine":"　高いのにしろって言うけど……","translatedEnglishLine":"You say to get the expensive one, but..."},{"lineNumber":174912,"originalJapaneseLine":"　本当は少し安いのくらいの方が、好きだから……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Honestly, I actually prefer something a little cheaper..."},{"lineNumber":174913,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この馬鹿、お前……","translatedEnglishLine":"You idiot..."},{"lineNumber":174914,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あとでお仕置きだからな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"You'll be punished later!"},{"lineNumber":174915,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それと、戸棚の裏にランス様の大好きな……","translatedEnglishLine":"And also, behind the cupboard, Lord Rance's favorite..."},{"lineNumber":174916,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ぱかぱか煎餅……かくして、ます……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Pakapaka rice crackers... I've hidden them..."},{"lineNumber":174917,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス様……あったら、全部食べちゃうから……","translatedEnglishLine":"Lord Rance... if they are there, you'll eat them all..."},{"lineNumber":174918,"originalJapaneseLine":"　後で……食べてくださいね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Please eat them later..."},{"lineNumber":174919,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それと、それと……えと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"And also, and also... um..."},{"lineNumber":174920,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちゃんと、夜寝る時はあったかくして下さいね……","translatedEnglishLine":"Please make sure to keep warm when you sleep at night..."},{"lineNumber":174921,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス様、すぐ暑がって布団はがすから……","translatedEnglishLine":"Lord Rance tends to get hot easily and throws off the covers..."},{"lineNumber":174922,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ごはん……バランスよく食べて下さいね……","translatedEnglishLine":"Please eat your meals with good balance..."},{"lineNumber":174923,"originalJapaneseLine":"　好き嫌い、あんまりしないで……","translatedEnglishLine":"Don't be too picky with what you like and dislike..."},{"lineNumber":174924,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うるさい！　うるさい！","translatedEnglishLine":"Shut up! Shut up!"},{"lineNumber":174925,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もう黙れ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Just be quiet already!"},{"lineNumber":174926,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こうなったら絶対にお仕置きするぞ！","translatedEnglishLine":"If it comes to this, I will definitely punish you!"},{"lineNumber":174927,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おい、だから死んだらしばくぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, so if you die, I'll still beat you up!"},{"lineNumber":174928,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うう……ランス様……ひどいです……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ugh... Lord Rance... that's awful..."},{"lineNumber":174929,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でも……えへへ……","translatedEnglishLine":"But... hehe..."},{"lineNumber":174930,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ありがとうございました……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Thank you very much..."},{"lineNumber":174931,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":174932,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……っ」","translatedEnglishLine":"...!"},{"lineNumber":174933,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おい……シィル……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey... Sheila...?"},{"lineNumber":174934,"originalJapaneseLine":"「シィル！　おい、シィル！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Sheila! Hey, Sheila!"},{"lineNumber":174935,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おい、おいってば……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, hey..."},{"lineNumber":174936,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……返事をしない奴はむちむちの刑だぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Those who don't respond will get the punishment of whipping."},{"lineNumber":174937,"originalJapaneseLine":"　シィル、聞いているのか……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Sheila, are you listening...?"},{"lineNumber":174938,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":174939,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………シィル」","translatedEnglishLine":"...Sheila."},{"lineNumber":174940,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが強く、強く強くシィルの体を抱きしめる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance tightly, very tightly embraced Sheila's body."},{"lineNumber":174941,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":174942,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":174943,"originalJapaneseLine":"突然のシィルの死。","translatedEnglishLine":"The sudden death of Sheila."},{"lineNumber":174944,"originalJapaneseLine":"それは祝宴を楽しむ皆に、","translatedEnglishLine":"It was a tremendous shock to everyone enjoying the celebration,"},{"lineNumber":174945,"originalJapaneseLine":"途方もない衝撃を与えた。","translatedEnglishLine":"It gave an enormous impact."},{"lineNumber":174946,"originalJapaneseLine":"――だが、事件はそれだけで収まらなかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"—However, the incident did not end there."},{"lineNumber":174947,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":174948,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":174949,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ！　あああぁああああ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah! Aaaaahhh!"},{"lineNumber":174950,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城の中にある客室から、","translatedEnglishLine":"From a guest room inside Rance Castle,"},{"lineNumber":174951,"originalJapaneseLine":"人の物とは思えないような悲鳴が響く。","translatedEnglishLine":"An inhuman-like scream echoed."},{"lineNumber":174952,"originalJapaneseLine":"「早く！　もっと大量の","translatedEnglishLine":"Quick! Bring a much larger quantity of"},{"lineNumber":174953,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ヒラミレモンを持ってきて下さい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hirami lemons!"},{"lineNumber":174954,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こんなのじゃ全然足りません！」","translatedEnglishLine":"This is nowhere near enough!"},{"lineNumber":174955,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、はいぃ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Y-yes!"},{"lineNumber":174956,"originalJapaneseLine":"メイド達が慌ただしく廊下を走る。","translatedEnglishLine":"The maids hurriedly ran down the hallway."},{"lineNumber":174957,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うぐっ！　ぐうぅうぅ！","translatedEnglishLine":"Ugh! Guuuu!"},{"lineNumber":174958,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ああ゛ああぁあ゛ああ゛ぁぁあ゛ああ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Aaaaahhh aaaahhhh aaaahhhh!"},{"lineNumber":174959,"originalJapaneseLine":"大量の鎖でベッドに縛り付けられた美樹が、","translatedEnglishLine":"Miki, bound to the bed with heavy chains,"},{"lineNumber":174960,"originalJapaneseLine":"体を暴れさせてもがき苦しんでいた。","translatedEnglishLine":"was struggling and thrashing in pain."},{"lineNumber":174961,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Guh..."},{"lineNumber":174962,"originalJapaneseLine":"美樹の魔王への覚醒――","translatedEnglishLine":"Miki's awakening to the Demon King—"},{"lineNumber":174963,"originalJapaneseLine":"現在、ランス城でそれが刻一刻と迫っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"At this moment, it was rapidly approaching inside Rance Castle."},{"lineNumber":174964,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よりによって、","translatedEnglishLine":"Of all days,"},{"lineNumber":174965,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人類が魔物に初めて勝利した","translatedEnglishLine":"the day humans first won against the monsters,"},{"lineNumber":174966,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こんな日に、なんて……」","translatedEnglishLine":"on a day like this..."},{"lineNumber":174967,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もし……神がいるとしたら……","translatedEnglishLine":"If... there is a god..."},{"lineNumber":174968,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それは随分と意地の悪い神のようね」","translatedEnglishLine":"then that god must be quite a cruel one."},{"lineNumber":174969,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さあ、美樹ちゃん！","translatedEnglishLine":"Come on, Miki-chan!"},{"lineNumber":174970,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ヒラミレモンを食べて……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Eat the Hirami lemons...!"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 高いのにしろって言うけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You say to get the expensive one, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当は少し安いのくらいの方が、好きだから……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Honestly, I actually prefer something a little cheaper...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この馬鹿、お前……
あとでお仕置きだからな！」
「それと、戸棚の裏にランス様の大好きな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And also, behind the cupboard, Lord Rance's favorite...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぱかぱか煎餅……かくして、ます……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pakapaka rice crackers... I've hidden them...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス様……あったら、全部食べちゃうから……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rance... if they are there, you'll eat them all...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後で……食べてくださいね……」
「それと、それと……えと……」
「ちゃんと、夜寝る時はあったかくして下さいね……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please make sure to keep warm when you sleep at night...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様、すぐ暑がって布団はがすから……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rance tends to get hot easily and throws off the covers...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ごはん……バランスよく食べて下さいね……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please eat your meals with good balance...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 好き嫌い、あんまりしないで……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't be too picky with what you like and dislike...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うるさい！　うるさい！
もう黙れ！」
「こうなったら絶対にお仕置きするぞ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If it comes to this, I will definitely punish you!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おい、だから死んだらしばくぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, so if you die, I'll still beat you up!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うう……ランス様……ひどいです……」
「でも……えへへ……
「ありがとうございました……」
「おい……シィル……？」
「シィル！　おい、シィル！」
「おい、おいってば……」
「……返事をしない奴はむちむちの刑だぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those who don't respond will get the punishment of whipping.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィル、聞いているのか……？」
ランスが強く、強く強くシィルの体を抱きしめる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance tightly, very tightly embraced Sheila's body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 突然のシィルの死。
それは祝宴を楽しむ皆に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was a tremendous shock to everyone enjoying the celebration,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 途方もない衝撃を与えた。
――だが、事件はそれだけで収まらなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: —However, the incident did not end there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ！　あああぁああああ！」
ランス城の中にある客室から、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From a guest room inside Rance Castle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人の物とは思えないような悲鳴が響く。
「早く！　もっと大量の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Quick! Bring a much larger quantity of

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヒラミレモンを持ってきて下さい！」
「こんなのじゃ全然足りません！」
「は、はいぃ！」
メイド達が慌ただしく廊下を走る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The maids hurriedly ran down the hallway.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うぐっ！　ぐうぅうぅ！
ああ゛ああぁあ゛ああ゛ぁぁあ゛ああ！」
大量の鎖でベッドに縛り付けられた美樹が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miki, bound to the bed with heavy chains,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 体を暴れさせてもがき苦しんでいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was struggling and thrashing in pain.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹の魔王への覚醒――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miki's awakening to the Demon King—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現在、ランス城でそれが刻一刻と迫っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At this moment, it was rapidly approaching inside Rance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よりによって、
人類が魔物に初めて勝利した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the day humans first won against the monsters,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな日に、なんて……」
「もし……神がいるとしたら……
それは随分と意地の悪い神のようね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then that god must be quite a cruel one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあ、美樹ちゃん！
ヒラミレモンを食べて……！」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
